history.proof: induction l as [| a l IHl]. -- simpl. intros Hprime Hp Hdiv. eapply lprod_ge_1 in Hp. sauto depth: 3. -- intros Hprime Hfa Hprod. simpl in Hprod. apply prime_div_mult in Hprod as [Hpa | Hlprod]; auto. ++ left. qsimpl time: 1. sfirstorder depth: 3. ++ right. apply IHl; auto. eapply Forall_inv_tail. apply Hfa.

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].
apply prime_div_mult in Hprod as [Hpa | Hlprod]; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment p, a : nat l : list nat IHl : prime p -> Forall prime l -> p <d lprod l -> In p l Hprime : prime p Hfa : Forall prime (a :: l) Hpa : p <d a H : nat Unable to unify "nat" with "a = p".

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].

original: induction l as [| a l IHl]. -- simpl. intros Hprime Hp Hdiv. exfalso. eapply lprod_ge_1 in Hp. lia. -- intros Hprime Hfa Hprod. simpl in Hprod. apply prime_div_mult in Hprod as [Hpa | Hlprod]; auto. ++ left. apply Hpa. ++ right. apply IHl; auto. eapply Forall_inv_tail. apply Hfa.
